City Council
============

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://www.cityofdonna.org/AgendaCenter/City-Council-7)

Members
-------

The Donna City Council is comprised of five members made up of the Mayor and four City Councilmen.

1. ![](https://www.cityofdonna.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=192 "David Moreno")

   #### David Moreno

   Mayor

   [More Information](https://www.cityofdonna.org/directory.aspx?eid=28)

1. ![](https://www.cityofdonna.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=194 "Jesse Jackson")

   #### Jesse Jackson

   Mayor Pro-Tem, Councilman, Place 1

   [More Information](https://www.cityofdonna.org/directory.aspx?eid=29)

1. ![](https://www.cityofdonna.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=195 "Joey Garza, Jr.")

   #### Joey Garza, Jr.

   Councilman, Place 2

   [More Information](https://www.cityofdonna.org/directory.aspx?eid=30)

1. ![](https://www.cityofdonna.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=193 "Ernesto Lugo, Jr.")

   #### Ernesto Lugo, Jr.

   Councilman, Place 3

   [More Information](https://www.cityofdonna.org/directory.aspx?eid=31)

1. ![](https://www.cityofdonna.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=327 "Manuel O Moreno")

   #### Manuel O. Moreno

   Councilman, Place 4

   [More Information](https://www.cityofdonna.org/directory.aspx?eid=32)

Advisory Boards
---------------

### Sign up to Serve Your Community

The City of Donna is continuously seeking volunteers to serve on various city-appointed advisory boards and committees. Appointments are made by the Mayor and City Councilmen. We need your help to better serve the community. Make a difference and be a part of the boards and committees to help make this happen.

Download an [application (PDF)](https://www.cityofdonna.org/DocumentCenter/View/126/BoardCommissionCommittee-Application-PDF).

1. [Agendas & Minutes](https://www.cityofdonna.org/AgendaCenter)
2. [City Charter](https://www.cityofdonna.org/DocumentCenter/View/372/City-of-Donna-Charter-Incl-Amendments-1-3)
3. [Boards & Commissions](https://www.cityofdonna.org/180/Boards-Commissions)

   1. [Board of Adjustments](https://www.cityofdonna.org/181/Board-of-Adjustments)
   2. [Capital Improvement Advisory Committee](https://www.cityofdonna.org/182/Capital-Improvement-Advisory-Committee)
   3. [Economic Development Board 4A](https://www.cityofdonna.org/183/Economic-Development-Board-4A)
   4. [Economic Development Board 4B](https://www.cityofdonna.org/184/Economic-Development-Board-4B)
   5. [International Bridge Corporation](https://www.cityofdonna.org/185/International-Bridge-Corporation)
   6. [Planning & Zoning Commission](https://www.cityofdonna.org/186/Planning-Zoning-Commission)
   7. [Building & Standards Commission](https://www.cityofdonna.org/217/Building-Standards-Commission)
4. [City Council](https://www.cityofdonna.org/187/City-Council)
